summary: Herbie, the magical Volkswagen Beetle, is passed on to a new owner. Together, they must battle a dastardly racer and his devil-car "Horace", an evil Herbie.
cast: Bruce Campbell|John Hannah|Alexandra Wentworth|Kevin J. O'Connor|Dana Gould|Harold Gould|Micky Dolenz|Burton Gilliam|Clarence Williams III|Dean Jones|Andy Houts|Mike Wills|Doug McCallie|Christin Hinojosa|Andrew Woodworth|Peter Spears|Rick Overton|Jeff Garlin|Alecia Guzman|Curtis Bradford|Richard Burch|Rich Hall|Herbie|Earl McDaniel III|John Scalco
keywords: twin|twins|good twin and evil twin|good twin versus evil twin|identical twins
title: Ahí va ese bólido de nuevo
